data.eml:eml: New genera, new species and new records of Indo-West Pacific spider crabs (Crustacea: Brachyura: Epialtidae: Majoidea)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Forges, Bertrand Richer De, Ng, Peter K. L. (2009): New genera, new species and new records of Indo-West Pacific spider crabs (Crustacea: Brachyura: Epialtidae: Majoidea). Zootaxa 2025: 1-20, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.186148
